nodes.text: Star Wars Weekly 97: Day of the Death Star! is the ninety-seventh issue in the Marvel UK Star Wars series of comics.

This issue includes The Day after the Death Star!, the first black & white part of the story The Day after the Death Star!, which was reprinted in color in Marvel Illustrated Books' Star Wars. Won't be until the arrival of the Star Wars Omnibus series from Dark Horse Comics that the comic shows its original non-color style.
